title: Lily Williams Poised for Breakout Season: ‘2024 is a Really Big Year for Me’
content:
Lily Williams, the ever-improving all-rounder on Human Powered Health, could be poised for a breakout spring classics campaign. Now in her fifth season as a pro, the former collegiate runner and Olympic track cycling medalist, Williams is the motor that gets the team to the finish line. This season, the 29-year-old is working hard toward … Continued

Read the full article at Lily Williams Poised for Breakout Season: ‘2024 is a Really Big Year for Me’ on Velo.
author: ahood
